messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: I was born in Eastleigh and have lived here all my life. I have fought against mass housing developments and traffic congestion. I will campaign for a controlled, fair Brexit exit to make sure we finish the job the voters asked for in Eastleigh.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Net migration to the UK needs to be controlled, with 256k in 2015, 209k in 2016, 205k in 2017, 314k in 2018, and 313k in 2019.
Our national security is undermined by policies that sell us out to the EU. UKIP will fight to get the best deal for Britain.
Your money on foreign aid should be better utilized, and public services such as the NHS and police should be funded by it instead.
